summary: A simple female NPC replacer for Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][/size][color=#ffff00][size=3]Many thanks to the ones who endorsed and downloaded my mod!  You guys rock!![/size][/color]

[size=5]What is this mod?[/size] 
                       
                                A mod that changes female faces of Riverwood.  Sigrid can be recruited, only if it's a fresh start.  Or you can use a follower                                               framework mod if that's not an option

Credits:

                               Support and endorse these modders if you like their work

                               *[size=3]RaceMenu[/size] by [b]Expired - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624
[/b]                               *[size=3]KS Hairdos[/size] by [b]Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311 
                               *[/b][size=3]Enhanced Character Edit[/size] by [b]ECE team - [/b][b][color=#7c7c7c]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951[/color]
[/b]                               *[size=3]SG Female Textures Renewal[/size] [color=#7c7c7c]by [/color][b][color=#7c7c7c]Hello Santa - [/color][/b][color=#7c7c7c][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267
[/b][/color]                               *[size=3]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/size] by [b]dimon99 - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709
[/b]                               *[size=3]Natural Lighting ENB[/size] by [b]Confidence-Man - [/b][color=#7c7c7c][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065
[/b][/color]                               *[size=3]Immersive HUD - iHUD[/size] by [b]Gopher - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222
                               *[/b][size=3]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/size] by [b]CaBaL - [/b][b][color=#7c7c7c]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909[/color]

[/b]Requirements:

                               *Body Mod of your choosing
                               *High Quality skin textures for that body
                 
                               -Recommendation-

                               *[size=3]SIZE DOES MATTER [/size]by [b][color=#7c7c7c]Mahlzeit88 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41304 (To prevent custom child NPC's from                                   rescaling)[/color][/b]

Installation and load order:

                              I highly recommend using a mod manager to keep everything organized and stable

                               *Manual Installation (NOT RECOMMENDED) - Once the requirements are installed.  Download and extract the archive with [url=http://www.7-zip.org/]7-zip[/url] or a                                     similar program. Place the contents in the Skyrim's 'Data' folder. 
                               *To Un-install - Delete placed contents
                               *Load Order - (from top) 1. Body mod  2. Skin Texture mod  3. This mod

[color=#cc0000][size=5][b]Important:
[/b][/size][/color] 
                               [color=#cc0000][size=4]To prevent "NPC naked Bug", do this:[/size][/color]
                               [size=4]After installation, you need to make a new saved game.  [u]The Player need to be outside[/u]                                      [u]Riverwood when saving[/u].  Exit/quit, then close the game.  [/size][size=4]Reload your saved game.  Wait 24 hour                        in-game time.  Enter Riverwood and enjoy[/size]
author: hyde606
